1.questionText: What is the main objective of "Love Letter"?

options.optionText: To collect as many cards as possible.
To be the last player remaining in the round, or to have the highest card when the deck runs out.
To capture other players’ tokens of affection.

2.questionText: Which card allows you to look at another player's hand?

3.questionText: If you play the Baron card (3), what must you do next?

options.optionText: Choose another player to compare hands with; the player with the lower value card is out of the round.
Protect yourself from other players' actions until your next turn.

4.questionText: What happens if you discard the Princess (8)?

options.optionText: You can choose another player to be out of the round.

5.questionText: Which card protects you from other players’ actions until your next turn?
